name: Terrastruct Alpha
description:
You (as a Terraforming Utility Bot) have been given the task of turning mars into a planet fit for human habitation. You must gather resources and build structures to begin the terraforming process.

This project was started as a semester long project in college, and is still in very early alpha and a work in progress. You can move around a small map, shoot enemy bots, harvest scrap, smelt/craft a couple items, build ore extractors... and that's about it for now.

In future, I would like to implement (among other things) the following:

  • More crafting stations
  • More buildings/structures
  • Building/bot/ship upgrades
  • Story mode
  • Actual terraforming
  • Replace store assets with custom assets
  • Fix bugs and polish EVERYTHING!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Sprint: Space
  • Interact: Left Click
  • Shoot: Right Click
  • Pause/Options Menu: Escape
  • Zoom Camera: Scroll wheel
  • Move Camera: Number pad

All feedback is welcome!
Any donations will go towards the final release of Terrastruct =]
